function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Informal collaborations between businesses could lead to increased risk of contagious disease transmission through close contact and shared spaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion among customers and employees, potentially leading to a surge in COVID-19 cases.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, maintain social distancing measures, and enforce mask-wearing policies in shared spaces.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, air purifiers, and UV-C sterilization devices for shared spaces.","People":"Customers, employees, and business owners involved in the collaborations.","Owner":"Business owners, local government, and public health authorities."}]}
